resources.string: "Motion Control is open source project, continuing of Motion Widget app. The source code is available on github here: https://github.com/fonaro/MotionWidget"
"Motion Widget is licensed under the Apache Licence, Version 2.0: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0"
"Motion Control is an Android app for controlling the linux motion detection software Motion http://www.lavrsen.dk/foswiki/bin/view/Motion"
